description: Dutch products, such as Yogi Organic Detox Energy Lemongrass, Dandelion, Liquorice, can be ordered worldwide, quickly and easily at Real Dutch Food
cleaned_text: Energy Lemongrass, Dandelion & Licorice Product description Sometimes our body and mind long for an inner cleansing, to gain new energy, strength and joie de vivre. We give you some support with this: spicy dandelion stimulates our metabolism, nettle has a slight diuretic effect and sparkling lemon refreshes us and our thoughts. Ingredients of: Yogi Organic Detox Energy Lemongrass, Dandelion * (11%) - ginger* - cinnamon* - lemon myrtle * - peppermint* - lemon peel * - nettle* - turmeric* - Juniper berries* - * controlled organic cultivation. - Gluten free, vegan, lactose free. Allergy Warning - Without Lactose - Gluten free Organic - IT-BIO-006 non-EU Agriculture
